articles.title: Lionel Messi and Wag Antonela enjoy another party to celebrate Argentina’s World Cup triumph as PSG edge win without him
articles.description: LIONEL MESSI enjoyed his latest party as he continues his post-World Cup break.The Argentine hero is in hometown Rosario still basking in his glory.Me
articles.content:
LIONEL MESSI enjoyed his latest party as he continues his post-World Cup break.
The Argentine hero is in hometown Rosario still basking in his glory.

articles.title: Best sporting moments of the year - No 2: Lionel Messi fulfils World Cup destiny with Argentina
articles.description: Having played his part in all three Argentina goals he then scored the first goal in the penalty shoot-out
articles.content:
Soccer – World Cup Final, Lusail Stadium, Qatar, December 18th
An iconic trophy held by an icon, Lionel Messi’s fulfilment of his destiny provided the end game to a World Cup unlike any other.

articles.title: Argentine tattooists swamped by demand for Messi tributes
articles.description: Since Argentina's World Cup win turned Buenos Aires into a massive street party, tattoo artists have been hard at work inking the image of Lionel Messi on the bodies of fans paying tribute to the man who has come to rival the legend of the country's other soccer god, Diego Maradona.
articles.content:
[1/4] Fermin Robilotte, 27, gets a tattoo of Argentina's soccer star Lionel Messi, after Argentina's soccer national team won FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022, in Buenos Aires, Argentina, December 21, 2022. REUTERS/Tomas Cuesta NO RESALES. NO ARCHIVES
BUENO... [2227 chars]

articles.title: Man Utd risk Alejandro Garnacho wrath after 'blocking' international call-up
articles.description: Alejandro Garnacho received his first senior Argentina call-up earlier in 2022, and has since kicked on for Manchester United under Erik ten Hag, scoring his first goals for the club
articles.content:
Manchester United are at risk of angering Alejandro Garnacho, with reports suggesting the club will block their starlet from joining up with Argentina's under-20 squad.

articles.title: 'An Idea of Perfection'- International Media Salutes Revolutionary Pele
articles.description: Newspapers in Argentina remembered Pele as a supreme symbol of football's spectacle and a great among the greats while the French sports daily L'Equipe devoted 22 pages to Pele
articles.content:
His face appeared on televisions around the world and dominated the homepages of news outlets everywhere as global media bowed to the late, great Pele, the undisputed “King" of football.
